verses.name: Joshua 9:4
verses.text: They did work wilily, and went and made as if they had been ambassadors, and took old sacks upon their asses, and wine bottles, old, and rent, and bound up;

verses.name: Joshua 9:5
verses.text: And old shoes and clouted upon their feet, and old garments upon them; and all the bread of their provision was dry and mouldy.

verses.name: Joshua 9:6
verses.text: And they went to Joshua unto the camp at Gilgal, and said unto him, and to the men of Israel, We be come from a far country: now therefore make ye a league with us.
